name: Chicken Crossing
description:
Do your best to cross the road while avoiding cars. But watch out! You have several smaller chickens following behind you. Try to get the most chickens to the other side

W to move forward. S to move backwards. A and D turns the player. Esc to leave the game

Alex  Petro - Animation

Andrew Stewart - 3D Model Designer

Brett Prank - Producer, Sound Design

Jonathan Delmonico - Music, Level Design

Matthew Hawkins - Programmer

Made in Unity
